WoWPaladin:DefaultOrb.NAME: Default Orb
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the start of your turn, draw #b

WoWPaladin:SealOfRighteousness.NAME: Seal of Righteousness
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the start of your turn, gain #b
Block. NL #yEvoke: Spend all Holy. Gain #b10 block per Holy spent.

WoWPaladin:SealOfLight.NAME: Seal of Light
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the start of your turn, heal #b
HP. NL #yEvoke: Spend all Holy. Heal #b5 HP per Holy spent.

WoWPaladin:SealOfJustice.NAME: Seal of Justice
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the start of your turn, gain #b
Thorns. NL #yEvoke: Spend all Holy. Deal #b7 damage to each enemy per Holy spent.
